news_header: Russia's disinformation campaigns target German elections and discredit centrist parties.
news_original_title: How Russia is influencing the 2025 German election
news_text: Russia has been actively influencing elections through disinformation, particularly targeting centrist parties in Germany ahead of the upcoming elections. Experts note large-scale campaigns aimed at discrediting the Greens, CDU, and SPD, while promoting the AfD. Recent examples include false claims about CDU candidate Friedrich Merz and corruption allegations against Green party leaders. Various operations, including Doppelgänger and Matryoshka, have been identified as part of Russia's strategy to spread uncertainty and polarize voters.
